summary: Implements a Home Assistant camera platform that wraps the Raspberry Pi camera module, exposing it as a camera entity. It handles configuration options such as image dimensions, quality, rotation, flips and timelapse, invokes the raspistill utility to capture pictures, manages temporary files, and provides the device name for Home Assistant integration.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to add and control a Raspberry Pi camera within their smart‑home setup, allowing automated image capture and monitoring through the Home Assistant UI and automations.
